ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:51:08 [Issue ID 4000-767855] urn:comicvine:4000-767855 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 21:29:46. [Issue ID 2117944]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Behold…DRAKULON. What the hell is Red Sonja doing there? How will its inhabitants greet her? And where…is…Vampirella? From JORDIE BELLAIRE (Buffy The Vampire Slayer) and DREW MOSS (Star Wars).
